Body:

Please help me

Body: Next, you need to publish the stream to youtube rtmp. Have you check [Azure Media Services](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/azure-media-services-rtmp-support-and-live-encoders/) and [RtmpClient](https://libraries.io/nuget/RtmpClient.UWP)?
i dont know but may be this will help, https://ffmpeg.org/ffplay.html
